Thank you very much for your extremely quick response.

I read the instructions and could not find where to send an email or post a
question, so posted a bug as a last resort.  I did a search on the
newsgroups and did not find any newsgroup that had any postings on the
subject.  I also tried to figure out the mailing lists thing without
success.  It is not at all clear to me what the heck I'm supposed to do. (Since 
originally writing this, I think I might have figurred out how to join the 
mailing list.  I'll find out.)

I tried 1, 2, and 3 escapes without success.  I didn't think of 4.  Perl
just needs 2. (After writing this I found some documentation which states the 
Java strings are quadruple-slashed.  I missed this the first time around.  I 
was naively thinking it should work the same as Perl.)

Thanks again for your help, and sorry to have used the bug system to bypass the 
regular channels.
